## WorldManager.getStats() method

**Signature:**

```text

        totalScenes&#58; number;
        totalEntities&#58; number;
        totalSystems&#58; number;
        memoryUsage&#58; number;
        isRunning&#58; boolean;

            maxWorlds?: number;
            autoCleanup?: boolean;
            cleanupInterval?: number;
            debug?: boolean;
        };

    };
```
